plugins.description:
Start the plugin and press the button to apply it to each text node in project

plugins.name: CircleTimer for Figma
plugins.description:
CircleTimer is a minimal, elegant countdown timer that runs inside Figma and FigJam.


Perfect for timeboxing activities like design critiques, interviews, sprints, and solo focus sessions.


• Choose from preset times (5, 15, 30, 60 mins)

• Or set a custom duration in minutes and seconds

• Optional “time’s up” alert

• Clean circular UI styled for Figma

• Escape key to close anytime


Works in both Figma Design and FigJam with zero setup. Designed to feel native to the platform.
plugins.tagline: Simple circular timer for focus sessions, critiques, or workshops in Figma and FigJam.

138467.name: CircleTimer for Figma
138467.description:

Perfect for timeboxing activities like design critiques, interviews, sprints, and solo focus sessions.

• Or set a custom duration in minutes and seconds

• Optional “time’s up” alert

• Clean circular UI styled for Figma

• Escape key to close anytime


Works in both Figma Design and FigJam with zero setup. Designed to feel native to the platform.
138467.tagline: Simple circular timer for focus sessions, critiques, or workshops in Figma and FigJam.

plugins.name: Gravity Themer
plugins.description:
Plugin allows you to effortlessly apply custom themes from Gravity UI Themer to your Figma designs.


Design your perfect theme using the Gravity UI Themer — choose your own colors, typography, and border radius. Then import your theme into Figma and instantly apply all the variables to components from the Gravity UI Figma library.

plugins.name: Wave Design Token Exporter
plugins.description:
The Design Token Exporter plugin allows designers and developers to easily export Figma's local styles and variables into a clean, structured JSON format.


Export color, text, and effect styles


Export all variable collections and modes


Choose between "Variables" or "Styles" before exporting


Copy JSON or download it for use in your design system


Perfect for integrating with codebases using tokens in Tailwind, Style Dictionary, or design systems

plugins.tagline: Export Figma styles and variables as design tokens in JSON format.

plugins.name: Typographica
plugins.description:
Typographica helps you quickly create beautiful and balanced font combinations for any project — from corporate dashboards to creative websites.


The plugin analyzes your chosen primary font, project style, and font metrics to generate harmonious font pairs automatically.


What does Typographica do?


  1. Generates Primary + Secondary + Accent font combinations
  2. Takes into account your project style (7 styles: business, corporate, modern, elegant, fun, personal, minimalist)
  3. Analyzes font metrics (x-height, glyph width, weight, stylistic characteristics)
  4. Automatically filters out fonts that do not fit the selected style
  5. Lets you save combinations as Figma text styles and variables
  6. Optionally adds smart descriptions to generated styles
  7. Supports manual swapping of secondary and accent fonts
  8. Works with any available fonts — Google Fonts, local fonts, and Figma-supported fonts


Who is it for?


  1. Product designers — to quickly build solid typography systems
  2. UX/UI designers — to improve readability and visual rhythm
  3. Brand designers — to find well-balanced and creative font pairs
  4. Beginners — to get guidance on what fonts work well together
  5. Experienced designers — to save time and explore unexpected combinations


How does it work?


  1. Choose your project style
  2. Select a Primary Font
  3. Click Change Pairs
  4. Browse the generated font pairs and accent options
  5. Save styles or variables in one click
  6. Tweak and refine as needed


Why use Typographica?


Save time — no more manual font pairing

Get better quality — pairs are based on font metrics and style fit, not guesswork

Flexible — works for classic and modern designs alike

Customizable — easy to adjust pairs or generate new ones on the fly


Styles and Tokens Support


Typographica not only generates font pairs, but also helps you create full-fledged text styles and design tokens in Figma.


You can save your Primary, Secondary, and Accent fonts as reusable Text Styles and optionally as Variables (Tokens) — making your typography consistent across your project and design system.


Style Description Table


Typographica can automatically generate a style description table for your font system — right inside Figma.


It creates a clear, editable table summarizing your Primary, Secondary, and Accent fonts, with suggested usage and style notes.


Perfect for documenting typography choices or sharing with your team and developers.


Typographica is your smart font pairing assistant in Figma. Make your typography cleaner, more beautiful, and more consistent — with less effort.

accepted.name: Andrei Kuznetsov
accepted.description: Templates, UI Kits, Design Systems, Plugins

plugins.tagline: Smart Font Pair Generator for Figma

plugins.name: Detach variables
plugins.description:
Detacher – Take Full Control Over Figma Variables

Tired of wasting time manually detaching variables? Detacher is your all-in-one solution to quickly scan, preview, and detach variables from your selection — with full control and confidence.


✅ What Makes Detacher Better?


Visual Variable Summary

Instantly see how many variables (Colors, Text, Numbers, Others) exist in your selection, with a live count and total — at a glance.


Smart Selection Control

Choose exactly what you want to detach — Colors, Text, Numbers, Others, or Typography — using simple checkboxes.


Typography Variable Support

Detach all typography-related variables, including mixed styles and both string & number-based properties (like font size, line height, letter spacing, paragraph spacing, and indent).


Preview Before Detach 🛡️

Optional “Preview Changes” mode lets you review exactly what’s about to change — no accidental detaching, no surprises.


One-click Detach

Once you're ready, just hit the Detach Variables button and move on. No friction, no bloated UI, no hidden steps.


⚙️ How It Works

  1. Select your frame, group, or section.
  2. Launch the plugin.
  3. Pick the variable types you want to detach.
  4. Preview (optional) → Confirm → Done.


https://buymeacoffee.com/habeebrahman


Future-Proof & Community-Focused

We're continuously testing new scenarios, but bugs can happen — so please send your feedback 🙏

Exciting features are already in the pipeline!
plugins.tagline: Detach differnet types of variables in a frame effortlessly !

plugins.name: Expression Blast
plugins.description:
As humans we feel. As humans we express.

We experience emotions like hunger, hangovers, confusion, or surprise. As designers especially, we often forget to eat, choosing instead to perfect one more button variation or tweak the kerning just a bit more—at the cost of sleep.

We feel so many things, yet have so few outlets to express them—whether we're collaborating with teammates or simply needing a small boost of joy. That’s why I created Expression Blast: a plugin that gives designers a playful way to express the real, everyday emotions we all experience.
plugins.tagline: An Outlet for Everyday Emotions.

134486.description:

plugins.name: Wireframe Pilot
plugins.description:
Description

Wireframe Pilot is a Figma plugin that lets you create beautiful, professional low-fi landing page wireframes for a wide range of industries—instantly. Choose from free, hardcoded industry templates or use AI to generate custom content and color schemes tailored to your business. Perfect for designers, agencies, and business owners who want to jumpstart their web projects with best-practice layouts and content.


Key Features

* One-click wireframe generation for 12+ industries (landscaping, tech, law, etc.)

* AI-powered content and color palette generation (with the option to use your own OpenAI API key)

* Customizable sections, layouts, and color schemes

* No coding required—everything happens inside Figma


Instructions

1. Open the plugin in your Figma file.

2. Select your industry and customize sections, layouts, and colors as desired.

3. (Optional) Enter your OpenAI API key to unlock AI-powered content and color generation.

4. Click “Generate Wireframe” to add a complete landing page wireframe to your canvas.

5. Edit and iterate as needed!
plugins.tagline: Instantly generate modern, wireframes for landing pages within in Figma.

138266.name: Wireframe Pilot
138266.description:

Wireframe Pilot is a Figma plugin that lets you create beautiful, professional low-fi landing page wireframes for a wide range of industries—instantly. Choose from free, hardcoded industry templates or use AI to generate custom content and color schemes tailored to your business. Perfect for designers, agencies, and business owners who want to jumpstart their web projects with best-practice layouts and content.


Key Features

* One-click wireframe generation for 12+ industries (landscaping, tech, law, etc.)

* AI-powered content and color palette generation (with the option to use your own OpenAI API key)

* Customizable sections, layouts, and color schemes

* No coding required—everything happens inside Figma


Instructions

1. Open the plugin in your Figma file.

2. Select your industry and customize sections, layouts, and colors as desired.

3. (Optional) Enter your OpenAI API key to unlock AI-powered content and color generation.

4. Click “Generate Wireframe” to add a complete landing page wireframe to your canvas.

5. Edit and iterate as needed!

networkAccess.reasoning: This plugin needs access to OpenAI's API for generating color schemes and content, Google Fonts for loading the Inter font family, and the custom backend for AI proxy.

138266.release_notes:
What's changed in this new version?

Interface Updates:
- Implemented a streamlined toggle switch for Basic/Pro mode selection
- Enhanced UI layout with improved visual hierarchy
- Optimized dialog interface for better Figma integration
- Refined input controls and button states

Technical Improvements:
- Enhanced accessibility compliance
- Optimized plugin initialization
- Refined error handling and user feedback

System Enhancements:
- Enhanced API key management system
- Improved visual feedback for system status
- Updated user interface components for better consistency
138266.tagline: Instantly generate modern, wireframes for landing pages within in Figma.

plugins.name: Hints
plugins.description:
Hints is an AI-powered Figma plugin that helps you quickly rename, group, and restructure your layers using smart, semantic naming and auto-layout suggestions.

> - Instantly rename layers with AI (Qwen) based on design context

> - Group and organize layers by semantic prefixes

> - Preview and apply auto-layout frames with smart direction and spacing

> - Works with Figma’s latest auto-layout features

> - Great for design systems, handoff, and large files

>

> Save time, reduce manual work, and keep your Figma files organized and developer-friendly!
plugins.tagline: AI-powered Figma layer renamer Design system assistant & auto-layout assistant

plugins.name: Section Auto-Resize with 200px Margin
plugins.description:
This plugin automatically resizes Figma Sections to fit their content and adds a 200px margin around the content area. It's designed to help teams maintain consistent spacing and layout rules without manually adjusting section boundaries.


Perfect for teams working with grid systems, spacing standards, or design system alignment workflows.
plugins.tagline: Auto-resize sections and apply consistent 200px margin padding.

plugins.name: GPT to Canvas
plugins.description: This plugin helps to plot e.g. tables from chatGPT research on to your Figma or FigJam canvas to be able to overcome chat interface limitations and spatially distribute information quickly especially on lengthy brainstorms. The plugin uses the OpenAI API and requires your personal OpenAI API Key.
plugins.tagline: Plot chatGPT research on canvas

The plugin uses the OpenAI API and requires your personal OpenAI API Key.

plugins.name: Quick Navigator
plugins.description:
Quick Navigator is a lightweight yet powerful plugin designed to help you stay oriented while working on large or complex Figma files. Instead of endlessly zooming and panning around, this plugin gives you a miniature view of your entire canvas thus making it easier than ever to find what you're looking for.


Features:

  1. See all your frames and sections in a simplified, scrollable mini window.
  2. Tap on any visible frame or section in the mini view to instantly select and focus it on the main canvas.
  3. Ideal when you're moving fast, experimenting, or managing chaotic canvases, no need for everything to be clean or structured.


NOTE: Currently, SVG shapes and text layers are not included in the mini view.
plugins.tagline: Never get lost on the canvas again!

plugins.name: Randomize
plugins.description:
How it Works:


Select Text Layers: Choose one or more text layers on your Figma canvas that you want to modify.


Open Randomize: Run the Randomize plugin.


Enter Your Items: In the input field, type or paste the different text strings you want to use, making sure each item is separated by a comma (,). For example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Alex Johnson, Maria Garcia


Click Randomize: Press the "Randomize" button.


See the Magic: The plugin will instantly replace the content of each selected text layer with a randomly selected item from the list you provided.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly populate selected text layers with random content from your custom list.

129638.name: Randomize
129638.description:

Enter Your Items: In the input field, type or paste the different text strings you want to use, making sure each item is separated by a comma (,). For example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Alex Johnson, Maria Garcia


Click Randomize: Press the "Randomize" button.


See the Magic: The plugin will instantly replace the content of each selected text layer with a randomly selected item from the list you provided.
129638.tagline: Effortlessly populate selected text layers with random content from your custom list.

plugins.name: Sticky Note Maker
plugins.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.


Key Features:

- Create sticky notes next to any selected frame (top-right) or centered in the viewport.

- Choose from 5 types: Note (blue), Fresh Idea (pink), Approved (green), Need Attention (yellow), Need Fix (red).

- Automatically includes your name and timestamp for easy tracking.

- Simple, icon-driven interface with color-coded hover and selection states.


How to Use:

1. Select a frame (or none for viewport placement).

2. Pick a sticky note type from the icon buttons.

3. Write your note and click "Create".


Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
plugins.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

126253.name: Sticky Note Maker
126253.description:
Sticky Note Maker

Effortlessly add colorful sticky notes to your Figma designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, and organizing ideas.


Key Features:

- Create sticky notes next to any selected frame (top-right) or centered in the viewport.

- Choose from 5 types: Note (blue), Fresh Idea (pink), Approved (green), Need Attention (yellow), Need Fix (red).

- Automatically includes your name and timestamp for easy tracking.

- Simple, icon-driven interface with color-coded hover and selection states.


How to Use:

1. Select a frame (or none for viewport placement).

2. Pick a sticky note type from the icon buttons.

3. Write your note and click "Create".


Ideal for designers, teams, and anyone who loves a visual way to comment and collaborate. Streamline your workflow with Sticky Note Maker!
126253.tagline: Add colorful sticky notes to your designs. Perfect for annotations, feedback, organizing ideas.

plugins.name: Preview Card Creator
plugins.description:
Overview

Create a preview card from selected frames. The card contains images generated from the frames and a link back to the original Figma file allowing for easy navigation.


Why use this?

  1. Got summary or overview pages? This is useful for deeper linking into specific pages without having to be familiar with the file.
  2. Got a centralized file that contains the whole application? Stop the file from getting large by replacing full flows with a preview card that deep links to individual Figma files.
plugins.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

plugins.name: DATVM
plugins.description:
DATVM makes it simple to inject realistic and varied data directly into your Figma designs, saving you time and keeping your mockups authentic.


100+ Built-in Datasets

Choose from a wide range of pre-populated categories.


Customizable Lists

Create and manage your own custom lists to perfectly match your project's specific needs.


Sort & Randomize

Sort data alphabetically, by length, or randomize for unique content every time.


Number Formatting

Format numbers with precision. Control decimal places, separators, currency symbols, and percentage variations.


Date Formatting

Easily format dates with customizable separators and order.


Bookmarks

Save your favorite lists for quick and easy access.


How it Works

  1. Select the text layers you want to populate.
  2. Open DATVM.
  3. Choose a data category from the available lists or select a custom list.
  4. Customize formatting options.
  5. Click to populate the selected layers with data.
plugins.tagline: Finest Data Populator

plugins.name: Magic Todo
plugins.description:
Magic Todo lets you organize and track your to-dos without leaving Figma.


✅Tasks Tab (available now): create and rename folders, add & remove tasks, check tasks off to move them into your Completed list, and restore with one click. Everything is saved between sessions.


✨Magic Tasks Tab (coming soon): type or paste free-form requirements and click “Generate Magic Tasks” to have AI instantly spin up a new folder full of actionable tasks.


Use Magic Todo today to keep your design work on track—and watch for our AI-powered task generator in the next release.
plugins.tagline: Folder‐based task manager in Figma (Magic Tasks coming soon)

plugins.name: Atomic by BigBasket
plugins.description:
Built this to enhance design and development efficiency in BigBasket.


Atomic transforms a single hex code into a complete set of design tokens and themes, instantly applying your brand's unique identity across all your apps and websites. This powerful plugin streamlines multi-brand design systems and campaigns, allowing you to effortlessly generate themes, export developer-ready tokens, and maintain consistency across every product.


Features:


Theme Generator

Define your core brand colors and let Atomic intelligently adjust shades to create a complete palette. You can then export this palette directly to your Figma canvas or instantly generate Figma variables as a complete theme. This helps you create brand modes instantly with proper semantics, enabling faster iterations for brand campaigns and seamless experimentation with colors, fonts, and effects.


Export to JSON

Export all your Figma design tokens directly to JSON, providing developers with a consistent and up-to-date source of truth. This significantly speeds up hand-offs and reduces implementation discrepancies.


Effects

Precise shadow colors and configure them for smoother, more nuanced visual effects. Apply consistent effects across all your brands, updating global styles with ease.


Spacing & Radius

Establish a consistent visual rhythm and hierarchy using dedicated tokens for spacing and border radius. You can use default values or easily adjust them to perfectly align with your brand guidelines.


Neutrals and Semantics

Automatically generates essential primitives and neutral colors. These foundational elements are crucial for building a robust and flexible design system that scales across multiple brands.



Any feedback?

Connect at hello@uxmurali.com

accepted.name: Murali
accepted.description: Product Designer who strives to create meaningful experiences that make people's lives better.

plugins.tagline: Your Brand, Your Styles, Instantly. Just One Click.

plugins.name: Gradientify
plugins.description:
Bring vibrant, layered gradients into your Figma designs. With this plugin, you can:


  1. Generate random gradients with an optional noise effect
  2. Paste CSS code from gradientify.app to apply gradients to layers
  3. Use gradients as fill properties for easy customization


Free trial

Try it out up to 5 times in each mode (random generation and CSS import), or unlock unlimited use with a license key.


Thank you for your support

This plugin was built to complement gradientify.app, a free tool for designing and animating gradients for the web. Buying a license helps keep the project going ❤️


Contact me:

If you have questions or comments, please send me a message to rengifo.eder@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Generate and paste CSS gradients to layers as fill properties

plugins.name: АвтоГрамоты | AutoGramoty
plugins.description:
Зачем нужен?

Если ты устал заполнять кучу грамот-сертификатов-благодарностей вручную, то этот плагин спасет тебя.

Несколько нажатий вместо нескольких часов


Как пользоваться?

  1. Добавьте маркер в виде текста {{ФИО}} на фрейм
  2. Выделите весь фрейм
  3. Запустите АвтоГрамоты
  4. Введите текст маркера
  5. Введите значения
  6. Нажмите "Создать"


Предложения принимаются в личке


How to use?

  1. Add a marker in the form of text {{KEY} to the frame
  2. Select the entire frame
  3. Launch AutoGramoty
  4. Enter the marker text
  5. Enter the values
  6. Click "Create"
plugins.tagline: Устал делать кучу грамот? Плагин решит твою проблему!

  3. Запустите АвтоГрамоты
  4. Введите текст маркера
  5. Введите значения
  6. Нажмите "Создать"

н е с к о л ь к о

plugins.name: GIF Boss
plugins.description:
Bring your designs to life with GIF Boss — the ultimate Figma plugin for creating powerful, customisable GIFs in seconds. Select a series of frames and transform them into smooth, high-quality animations with full control over:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions
plugins.tagline: Simultaneous multi GIF generation.

136516.name: GIF Boss
136516.description:

  1. Timing & Looping – Set frame durations and loop styles with ease
  2. Reordering – Drag and drop to perfect your frame sequence
  3. Optimisation – Shrink file sizes without compromising quality
  4. Bulk Creation – Generate several GIFs simultaneously. Ideal for large campaign roll-outs with multiple animated banner ads of different dimensions

plugins.name: ProtoFlow – Offline Clickable Prototypes
plugins.description:
💡 Cos'è ProtoFlow?

ProtoFlow è un plugin gratuito per Figma che ti permette di esportare un prototipo interattivo cliccabile in locale, in formato HTML + PNG. Nessun hosting, nessuna connessione internet necessaria. Basta un browser.


Perfetto per:


Test utente su dispositivi embedded


Demo da inviare ai clienti


Presentazioni offline


Contesti in cui Figma non è accessibile


🚀 Come funziona


Seleziona uno o più frame da esportare.


Scegli il frame di partenza.


Risolvi eventuali errori o warning.


Clicca “Scarica prototipo”.


Viene generato un archivio .zip con:


start.html: il file principale da aprire in locale


screens/: la cartella con tutte le schermate e i file HTML


README.txt: guida completa all’utilizzo


🧠 Come sono gestite le interazioni?


Ogni collegamento tra frame in Figma diventa un link cliccabile nella pagina HTML.


Gli elementi con Navigate To + Instant vengono interpretati come hotspot.


Anche un’intera schermata può essere interattiva.


📦 Cosa contiene il file ZIP?


start.html: la pagina iniziale del prototipo


screens/: tutte le schermate in PNG + HTML per ogni frame


README.txt: istruzioni complete all’uso, anche per utenti non tecnici


⚠️ Importante: non rinominare o spostare screens/, né i file .html o .png, altrimenti i collegamenti si romperanno.


📘 Istruzioni integrate

Nel tab "Istruzioni" del plugin trovi una guida dettagliata. Puoi anche consultare il file README.txt incluso nell’archivio per avere una versione offline, utile da condividere con il tuo team o clienti.


🔐 Nessun dato viene inviato online.

Tutto il processo avviene localmente nel tuo browser. Le immagini e i file generati non lasciano mai il tuo computer.


👨‍💻 Creato da

Francesco Cerisano (Havas Milan)
plugins.tagline: Esporta prototipi cliccabili offline da Figma in HTML+PNG. Perfetto per test e demo

plugins.name: Swap Dimensions
plugins.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

136052.name: Swap Dimensions
136052.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
136052.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

plugins.name: Design Roaster
plugins.description:
Design Analyzer & Enhancer is your intelligent Figma assistant, designed to help you elevate your designs to the next level. With a single click, this plugin scans your entire Figma file, analyses your current design, and delivers a comprehensive review—including pros, cons, and actionable recommendations for improvement.

But that’s not all: inspired by your existing work, Design Analyzer & Enhancer also proposes an enhanced design concept, offering you a creative starting point for your next iteration. Whether you’re seeking a quick design audit or looking for fresh inspiration, this plugin empowers designers of all levels to create more polished, user-friendly, and visually compelling interfaces.

Key Features

• Automated Design Analysis: Instantly review your design’s strengths and areas for improvement.

• Actionable Recommendations: Get practical tips and suggestions tailored to your specific design.

• Proposed Enhanced Designs: Explore new design directions generated based on your current work.

• Easy to Use: One-click operation, no complex setup required.

• Boost Your Creativity: Use AI-powered insights to inspire your next great design.

• Transform your workflow, catch overlooked issues, and get inspired—all without leaving Figma.
plugins.tagline: Designer's companion for better UX/UI by ABA Bank

136990.description:

But that’s not all: inspired by your existing work, Design Analyzer & Enhancer also proposes an enhanced design concept, offering you a creative starting point for your next iteration. Whether you’re seeking a quick design audit or looking for fresh inspiration, this plugin empowers designers of all levels to create more polished, user-friendly, and visually compelling interfaces.

plugins.name: Brand compliance check
plugins.description:
Branding compliance check Figma Plugin


Purpose

The Branding-compliance-check plugin helps designers ensure that their design elements are consistent with the assets library added to their Figma file. It highlights and marks design elements that are not from the assets library, ensuring branding compliance.


Features

  1. Design Elements Check: Verify if colors, fonts, Non-component frames & effects are from the assets library.
  2. Highlight Issues: Select and bring non-compliant elements to the user's viewport.
  3. Mark Issues: Add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.


Usage guidelines

  1. Select Design Elements: Check the boxes for the design elements you want to verify.
  2. Highlight Issues: Click the "Highlight issues" button to select and bring non-compliant elements to the viewport.
  3. Mark Issues: Click the "Mark issues" button to select and add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.
plugins.tagline: Quick sanity checks for Figma files to verify if design elements of file are brand library aligned

135406.name: Brand compliance check
135406.description:
Branding compliance check Figma Plugin


Purpose

The Branding-compliance-check plugin helps designers ensure that their design elements are consistent with the assets library added to their Figma file. It highlights and marks design elements that are not from the assets library, ensuring branding compliance.


Features

  1. Design Elements Check: Verify if colors, fonts, Non-component frames & effects are from the assets library.
  2. Highlight Issues: Select and bring non-compliant elements to the user's viewport.
  3. Mark Issues: Add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.


Usage guidelines

  1. Select Design Elements: Check the boxes for the design elements you want to verify.
  2. Highlight Issues: Click the "Highlight issues" button to select and bring non-compliant elements to the viewport.
  3. Mark Issues: Click the "Mark issues" button to select and add a red stroke around non-compliant elements.
135406.tagline: Quick sanity checks for Figma files to verify if design elements of file are brand library aligned
